about_the_game:
Choose your location

Based on real-world data from OpenStreetMap, you can play anywhere in the world. Explore your own neighborhood from the perspective of a budding farmer, or try to become a successful agriculture magnate in all other locations on the planet.

With this free map pack you will be able to place your farm anywhere in Asia!
detailed_description:
Choose your location

Based on real-world data from OpenStreetMap, you can play anywhere in the world. Explore your own neighborhood from the perspective of a budding farmer, or try to become a successful agriculture magnate in all other locations on the planet.

With this free map pack you will be able to place your farm anywhere in Asia!

name: Global Farmer - Asia

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-8700, AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: UHD Graphics 630 or similar
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-8700, AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 6GB or similar

short_description: Farm the world in an immersive top-down management game that lets you choose your farm's location anywhere on the real-world map!With this free map pack you will be able to place your farm anywhere in Asia!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain
